charges.charge_disposition: Purs to sentg reform Act of 1984, it is the jgm of the Crt that the dft is hereby comm to the cust of the BOP to be impris for a term of 16 mos. it is fur Ord that the dft pay a fine of $2,000.00 to the U.S. Upon rel frm impris, the dft is placed on sup rel for a period of 3 yrs on the following t &; c: 1. the dft comply w/the r &; r of the USPO and G O 318; 2. the dft shall pay a fine imposed by this jgm and that remains unpaid at the commencement of the term of community supervision, as directed by the P/O; 3. the dft shall comply w/the r &; r of the INS, and if deported, nto reenter the U S, illegally. Upon any reentry to teh U S during the period of sup rel, the dft shall rpt to the nearest USPO w/in 72 hours. It is fur Ord that the dft pay a $50.00 S/A to teh U. S. Execution of sent is stayed until 12 noon, 6/2/92 at which time the dft shall surr to the institution designated by the BOP, or in the absence of said designation, to the USM office in Los Angeles, CA. The Crt recommends placement at Boron, CA (1)
